Key: I thought I'd find her here, but...
Seems like Kurumi isn't here.

Oh, well. Nothing I can do then. I guess I
could try looking somewhere else.

Huh...? Did Tohka and Origami go home
already?
Man, guess that means no date for me today.

We're out of milk and eggs, so maybe I can
drop by the market then head home.
So, where's the milk... Huh...?
Wait...? Did I...
Yeah... It's Kurumi.
Hey, Kurumi... What are you doing here?
Wait...? Is she avoiding me...?

Well, it's not like we're close, but that kind
of hurts...

Hm. I don't see the point in running after
her, either. I guess I'll finish shopping first.
All right. All that's left to get are eggs.

Wait, she's not avoiding me. Is she stalking
me...? What's her deal?
Hey, Kurumi!
Aah!

That's so mean. Why are you screaming
out of the blue?
S-Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you...
But... you've been stalking me, haven't you?
Oh, what are you talking about?
Uh... it's totally obvious.
Well, I suppose, huh?
So you are?! Why would you do that...?
Hehehe... Call it curiosity.
Curiosity?

Yes. I've always wanted to do it. I figured
even if you caught me, Shido-san, you'd
forgive me.

Well, that might be true, but... more than that,
here.
What's with the hand?

Well, I don't like how you're still on the
floor. Especially since—um, I don't know
where to move my eyes.
Huh?
...Your skirt's lifted up.

My, my. Right you are. Hehe, Shido-san,
you're staring. Boys will be boys.
NONONONONONO?!
Oh...? Why the long face? Want to see more?
I-I didn't mean it like that...
Heheh. I was only kidding. Very well. Good day.
Oh... H-Hey, Kurumi.
...What was that all about?
